QuestData.Title: Call of Duty
QuestData.Description: Citizen!$b$bAs you may have heard, the Horde's attacking just offshore. The fighting's been fierce and relentless.$b$bWe need every able body out there repelling the enemy!$b$bReport to the northernmost dock at once for transport to the battle.$b$bOh, and our official warships are... err, a bit late in their scheduled return. Don't worry though, we've commissioned mercenary vessels to serve in the meantime.$b$bHurry along now, $c. Stormwind needs you!
QuestData.AreaDescription: Ride the mercenary ship to Vashj'ir
QuestData.LogDescription: Ride the mercenary ship to battle.
QuestData.RewardText: Not exactly the battle you had anticipated, I'll wager. But a battle nonetheless, as you shall soon see....

Objectives.Objective: Ride the mercenary ship to Vashj'ir
